Context: Jason Kuchinsky attended George Brown College School of Culinary Arts in 2012 with the dream of becoming a world-class chef. He established the Jason Kuchinsky Scholarship Fund in his memory, which aims to inspire and facilitate the journey of deserving new students to achieve their life goal of opening a restaurant. For donation-related queries or assistance, contact Trinity Zang at tyzhang@georgebrown.ca or 416-415-5000 ext 3083. The website content is subject to change and should not be considered as a representation, offer, or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements. The college's contact numbers are 416-415-2000 and TTY: 1-877-515-5559. Their email address is ask.george@georgebrown.ca, and they have a social media hub for further information.
